en: In the center of Espérou, crossroads of the men of the road (roundabout), come to discover our Atypical Grocery where reigns the atmosphere of the MOUNTAIN by its smells and its colors. Fine grocery of Mountain which exists for more than 40 years. Laurent l'Epicier of the village (former Restaurateur of the Michelin Guide) will be able to advise you on the Products of the Country: CHARMERIE/CREMERIE/FROMAGES everything for the good old meal (picnic) The grocery is located in Espérou (station of medium mountain of 130 inhabitants, located at 30 km from Le Vigan, under Prefecture of the Gard), on the axis leading to the last meteorological station of France of the Aigoual Mount very visited in tourist season. In winter, it benefits from the proximity of the ski resort of Prat-Peyrot. Moreover, it is common to come tobogganing in l'Espérou when there is snow. It is therefore located at the crossroads of a tourist area that attracts people in summer and winter, well known in the major cities of the Languedoc. It is a multi-product grocery store: dry grocery, fresh produce, dairy products, frozen food, with specific local products of the soil. It is a bread depot, point Midi Libre. It is open all year round. It has a small souvenir shop. Monday to Saturday: 8H30-12H30/16H00-19H00 Sunday: 8H30-12H30 closed on WEDNESDAY except in season
